title: Verify that the app doesn't crash on startup or during navigation
custom_preconds: Given the app has been installed
custom_steps: When the user opens the app and navigates around
custom_expected: Then the app does not crash with any frequency

title: Verify app doesn't have an abundant amount of obvious bugs
custom_preconds: Given the app has been installed
custom_steps: When the user opens the app
custom_expected: Then the app does not have obvious bugs or issues relating to alignment or restricting usability

title: Verify app performs as advertised by the developer
custom_preconds: Given the app has been installed
custom_steps: When the user uses the application
custom_expected: Then the app performs in the way that is advertised by the developer

title: Verify the app doesn't include undocumented or hidden features inconsistent with the description
custom_preconds:
Given the application has been installed 
And the user has read the documentation  describing the features of the application
custom_steps: When the user uses the application
custom_expected: Then there are no features or hidden uses that the user should have been made aware of before installing

title: Verify the app is not termed "beta", "demo", "trial", or "test" versions
custom_preconds: Given the app has been installed
custom_steps: When the user is using the application
custom_expected: Then there should not be any references to the words "beta", "demo", "trial" or "test" in the version slated for release

title: Verify that iPhone apps must also run on iPad without modification, at iPhone resolution, and at 2X iPhone 3GS resolution
custom_preconds:
Given the app has been installed on an iPhone with high resolution display
Given the app has bene installed on an iPhone with lower resolution display
Given the app has been installed on an iPad
custom_steps: When the user runs the application
custom_expected: The application should run without issue on the three different screen types including a 2X size on iPad

title: Verify that app doesn't intend to provide trick or fake functionality that is not clearly marked
custom_preconds:
Given the app has been installed
And the user has read the documentation provided with the application
custom_steps: When the user navigates through the app
custom_expected: Then there should not be an functionality that tries to fake or trick the user into doing something they are not aware they are doing

title: Verify that app doesn't provide incorrect diagnostic or other inaccurate device data will be rejected
custom_preconds: Given that the application contains diagnostic device information
custom_steps: When checked to verify that it is correct
custom_expected: Then if the data is incorrect the app will be rejected

title: Verify that all images in the app support both Retina and non-Retina displays
custom_preconds: Given the application has been installed
custom_steps: When the user tries to use the application on either a Retina or Non-Retina display
custom_expected: The application will work without issue and both resolutions are supported

title: Verify that the app icon is the same standard size as all other app icons in the app store
custom_preconds: Given the application has been installed
custom_steps: When the application is set on the homescreen
custom_expected: Then the application icon should be the same standard size as all other app icons
